There is no AntModel for these editors.

Fixed in the AntEditor and the ToggleMarkOccurrencesAction to handle the 
AntEditor being opened on an editor input that we cannot generate an AntModel 
for.

Also changes to OccurrencesFinder.

Please verify DarinW.
